price: Muhammad não é pai de nenhum de vossos homens, mas o Mensageiro de Allah e o selo dos Profetas. E Allah, de todas as cousas, é Onisciente.
arabic: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَآ أَحَدٖ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن رَّسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna muḥammadun abā aḥadin min rijālikum walākin rasūla al-lahi wakhātama al-nabiyīna wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīman
